topics.body:
I always thought it was interesting how a lot of the elder scrolls races are analogous to real races. 

Like, nords and reguards are fairly obvious. imperials are, what, Greeks?

And then there's more vague ones like khajiit who seem to be _kinda_ middle eastern? And the elves who always came off to me as being _kiiinda_ Asian? 

Although maybe that's more akivir considering akiviri weapons and architecture are directly Asian inspired 


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55652e376368721d66330100#post_55652e376368721d66330100
YEAH PUSH IT
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
Just finished Accel World.

Good show. I hear that season 2 has been confirmed? I hope so cuz there are MAAAAAAAAAANY questions and things just left totally unanswered in this show.

I mean for fuck sake *SPOILERS* [spoiler]In the last episode its confirmed that if Brain Burst is deleted from your gear it takes away ALL and I mean ALL memories of the game ever being played by you or even fucking installed. You wont remember _nothing_ of this game after you lose all your points and get it forcefully deleted[/spoiler] So yeah I want to know what is going on with this game? 

Show of course has its problems and its probably not a show everyone can get into, I can tell, but for me I give it a 7.8/10. Ok series.
